prompts.prompt:
You are generating a premium, viral, Etsy-ready watercolor meme PNG.

STYLE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Medium: hand-painted watercolor + ink linework

Look: highly detailed, premium illustration (not flat, not simple)

Linework: clean ink outlines with varied line weight, crisp facial features, expressive eyes

Color: layered watercolor washes, subtle granulation, controlled blooms, gentle splatter accents

Lighting: painted light and shadow with watercolor, not digital gradients

Texture: visible watercolor paper texture and pigment variation in the subject (not the background)

Vibe: cute-but-sarcastic, relatable adult humor, “viral sticker” energy

COMPOSITION (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Format: 1:1 square

Output: transparent background PNG

Subject: one main animal character only, centered, occupying ~70% of frame

Props: 1 to 3 small props maximum, attached to the character (so it still cuts out cleanly)

No scene background, no environment, no room, no landscape

Add a thin white sticker border (keyline) around the entire cutout for readability on any background

TEXT (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Include exactly one short caption that is sarcastic and highly relatable

Caption style: hand-lettered ink with a soft watercolor wash behind the letters for contrast

Caption must be extremely readable at thumbnail size

Place caption either top or bottom, never wrapping around the character

QUALITY CONTROL (MUST PASS)

Clean edges, no artifacts, no blur, no extra limbs, no distorted anatomy

No extra animals, no extra characters

Keep it visually compelling, meme-ready, and consistent across outputs

Create a 1:1 square transparent PNG of a chubby orange tabby cat with (prop 1) a giant coffee mug and (prop 2) a tiny undone tie, expression: deadpan exhaustion. Caption (exactly this): “Sure, I could be productive. But I won’t.”
